targets.expr: count by (nodepool)(karpenter_nodes_allocatable{nodepool!="N/A",resource_type="cpu"}) # Selects a single resource type to get node count

panels.description: Shows CPU capacity, request, and usage
panels.title: CPU capacity/request/usage

panels.description: Shows Memory capacity, request, and usage
panels.title: Memory capacity/request/usage

panels.description: The rate of completed reconciliations per minute broken out by result status.
panels.title: Reconciliations per minute

panels.description:
Aggregates the duration of the reconciliation process.

The color of each "bucket" is a visual clue to the number of reconciliations that completed within that time range.

Mouse-over a bucket to display exact values.
panels.title: Reconciliation duration
